about_the_game:
About

You are Issei Ito, a talented but underappreciated security specialist at METTA East, drowning in gambling debt and office politics. When a mysterious offer from the company's enigmatic CSO promises to solve all your problems, you're thrust into a dangerous world of corporate conspiracy and moral ambiguity.

Experience a diverging plot over two weeks in 1992 Japan where your choices in dialogue and your actions in the top-down 2D world dramatically impact the course of the story.

Whatever your actions, Issei's fate is in your hands.

Work

Congratulations on the new gig employee. Everyday you'll be expected to:

  • Engage in daily office tasks through unique minigames

  • Balance your performance to maintain an excellent standing.

Hack

But, you're job doesn't stop there. After work you'll be expected to:

  • Infiltrate secure servers in a strategic, node-based hacking minigame

  • Deploy virtual 'towers' with various offensive and defensive capabilities

  • Risk detection with each move – failure could cost you your job

That's if you want that debt paid off...

Live

Once you're done with all your work, perhaps you could relax by:

  • Spending your evenings exploring the vibrant city of Osaka

  • Building relationships with co-workers through various activities

  • Playing minigames with NPCs in bars, arcades, and other locations

Features

  • Unravel a compelling story of betrayal, revenge, and unexpected alliances

  • Navigate the cutthroat world of Japanese corporate culture in this satirical office sim

  • Hack into secure servers to out a corporate spy.

  • Manage your company reputation and personal relationships with co-workers

  • Engage in various minigames that break up the narrative and provide unique challenges

  • Explore 1990s Osaka during your off-hours, building relationships and uncovering secrets

  • Make crucial decisions that impact the story, leading to multiple endings

name: Japanese Salaryman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Step into Issei's shoes as he navigates a maze of corporate intrigue. Hack secure servers, outwit rivals, forge alliances, and climb the corporate ladder desperately for freedom. But, remember employee, the truth is in overtime!
